word_group.brief_definition: 工作机会；就业机会；就业机遇
把握机会；抓住机会；抓住机遇

就业机会；就业机遇；雇用机会

bilingual.source: Imagine having the opportunity to sing together.
bilingual.target: 想象一下有机会一起唱歌。

bilingual.source: It's a good opportunity to visit elderly relatives.
bilingual.target: 这是探望年长亲戚的好机会。

bilingual.source: And now I was about to get the opportunity to do it all again.
bilingual.target: 现在我即将再次获得这个机会。

bilingual.source: More importantly, it was an opportunity for our whole family to get together.
bilingual.target: 更重要的是，这是全家团聚的机会。

bilingual.source: Almost every teenager dreams of having the opportunity to sing in public.
bilingual.target: 几乎每个青少年都梦想有机会在公众面前唱歌。

bilingual.source: I try to take every opportunity to get outside and admire the natural world.
bilingual.target: 我尽量抓住每一个机会到户外欣赏自然世界。

bilingual.source: There are also Extension activities to ensure pupils have ample opportunity to practice.
bilingual.target: 还有扩展活动以确保学生有充足的练习机会。

bilingual.source: It's a fantastic opportunity for new students to get to know the school and the other students.
bilingual.target: 这是新生了解学校和其他学生的绝佳机会。

bilingual.source: It was not only for the delicious food that we seldom got to eat, but for the opportunity to have our whole family gathered together.
bilingual.target: 不仅是因为难得吃到的美味食物，更是因为全家团聚的机会。

yingyinNormal.en: That was a missed opportunity.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她错失了一个机会。

yingyinNormal.en: This was his opportunity and he seized it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这就是他的机会，他抓住了。

yingyinNormal.en: This is a fantastic opportunity for experiment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是一个绝佳的做实验的机会。

yingyinNormal.en: The world has presented me with an opportunity.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我相信世界已经给予了我一个机会。

yingyinNormal.en: Which is why I'm giving you an opportunity to comment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以我才想给你机会就此事发表评论。

yingyinNormal.en: We have an opportunity to build a revolutionary machine.
yingyinNormal.zh: 命运给了我们机会来发明一款革命性的机器

yingyinNormal.en: It seems an auspicious opportunity. They are afraid of war.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这似乎是个不错的机会，他们惧怕战争。

yingyinNormal.en: We tolerate discrimination and we pretend that opportunity is equal.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们容忍歧视 假装机会是平等的。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《Facebook COO谢丽尔·桑德伯格哈佛演讲》

yingyinNormal.en: Think of cleaning up this park as an opportunity. To get hepatitis?
yingyinNormal.zh: 把清洁这座公园当成一个机会。得肝炎的机会吗？

yingyinNormal.en: He had ample opportunity to do us real damage and he didn't.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他有的是机会搞破坏，但他没有。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, we know that's not opportunity knocking. He lost my address when I moved in here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们可以确定不是机会来敲门，因为我搬来这里后，"机会"就弄丢了我的地址。

yingyinNormal.en: And with the power out, Coin sees this as an opportunity.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一旦电力被切断，科因一定会抓住这个机会。

yingyinNormal.en: You don't miss the opportunity to delve deeper with your patients?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不怀念和病人亲密接触的机会吗？

yingyinNormal.en: And that's not an opportunity people always get before a parent dies, and I'm grateful to have had that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 人们并不是都能在父母离世前有这样的机会，我很感激有这样的机会。

yingyinNormal.en: Listen, I hate to miss an opportunity just because I didn't ask. you know?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不想因为没开口而失去机会。

yingyinNormal.en: He was right. It was a great opportunity. I may have been a bit hasty turning down that job offer so quickly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他说得对，确实是个大好的机会。那个工作机会我可能拒绝得太急了。

yingyinNormal.en: Only in this case, I am offering you the opportunity to become a Kingsman.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在，我要给你一个为皇家服务的机会。

yingyinNormal.en: No, no, you got to go. You can't turn down an opportunity like this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不不，你一定得去，不应该放弃这样的一个机会。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm giving you an opportunity to bow out gracefully, just like Robert.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我是在给你体面退出的机会，就像罗伯特那样。

yingyinNormal.en: Both of you have just squandered an opportunity to show us who you are.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们两个都浪费了一个机会来向大家展示你们。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 工作机会；就业机会；就业机遇

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a set of circumstances that makes it possible to do something

examination_example.sentence: Brexit is seen by some as an <highlight>opportunity</highlight> to reverse a recent trend towards the UK importing food.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些人认为，英国脱欧是扭转近期英国进口食品趋势的一个机会。

examination_example.sentence: In order to ensure that elite women have more such <highlight>opportunities</highlight>, they have proposed imposing government quotas.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了确保精英女性有更多这样的机会，他们提议实施政府配额。

examination_example.sentence: Furthermore, these losses make us mature and eventually move us toward future <highlight>opportunities</highlight> for growth and happiness.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此外，这些损失让我们变得成熟，并最终为我们未来的成长和幸福提供机会。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, 表示"…状态, 性质"

word_usage.usage: 表示“做某事的机会、时机”可以说opportunity to do sth.、opportunity for sth/for doing sth.或opportunity of doing sth.。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a set of circumstances that makes it possible to do something

examination_example.sentence: Methods such as whole school fund raising, with the proceeds (收益) pooled, can help to extend <highlight>opportunities</highlight> and fuel community spirit.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如全校筹集资金并集中收益的方法，可以帮助扩大机会并激发社会精神。

examination_example.sentence: Our attitudes allow us to turn mistakes into <highlight>opportunities</highlight>, and loss into the chance for new beginnings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们的态度可以让我们把错误转变成机遇，把失败变成重新开始的机会。

examination_example.sentence: Some schools have shown remarkable determination and ingenuity in ensuring that pupils are able to take up <highlight>opportunities</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些学校也表现出了非凡的决心和独创性，以确保学生都能抓住机会。

examination_example.sentence: This means that if you give people multiple <highlight>opportunities</highlight> to lie for their own benefit, they start with little lies which get bigger over time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这意味着，如果给受试者诸多为自身利益而撒谎的机会，他们一开始会撒个小谎，随着时间的推移，谎言会越来越大。

examination_example.sentence: There was one thing I was looking forward to the most; the <highlight>opportunity</highlight> to have work friends once again.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那时，我最期待的就是能有机会在职场上再交到朋友。

examination_example.sentence: Leaders would call a temporary stop to fishing for key species in order to give fish stocks an <highlight>opportunity</highlight> to replenish (补充).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 领导者将呼吁暂时停止捕捞关键物种，以便为鱼类种群提供补充的机会。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a set of circumstances that makes it possible to do something

examination_example.sentence: Their activities may also create <highlight>opportunities</highlight> for invasive plants to colonize these areas.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们的活动也可能为入侵植物在这些地区定居创造机会。
他们不会得到晋升的机会。

examination_example.sentence: Given the weak job <highlight>opportunities</highlight> facing young adults, living at home was part of the private safety net help young adults to weather the economic storm.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 鉴于年轻人面临就业机会不足，住家是帮他们经受住经济风暴的私人安全网的一部分。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, 表示"…状态, 性质"

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a set of circumstances that makes it possible to do something

examination_example.sentence: Beyond satisfying a material need, he has provided an <highlight>opportunity</highlight> for kids in his neighborhood to learn how to fix their own bikes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除了满足物质需求，他还为邻居家的孩子提供了一个学习如何修理自行车的机会。

examination_example.sentence: Your child has been looking for an <highlight>opportunity</highlight> to climb out of the window.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你的孩子一直在寻找机会爬出窗外。

examination_example.sentence: Being liked creates <highlight>opportunities</highlight> for learning and for new kinds of life experiences that help somebody gain an advantage.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 被人喜欢可以为学习和新的生活体验创造机会，从而帮助人们获得优势。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, 表示"…状态, 性质"

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a set of circumstances that makes it possible to do something

examination_example.sentence: Any <highlight>opportunity</highlight> to expose children to more vegetables is meaningful.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 任何让孩子接触更多蔬菜的机会都是有意义的。

examination_example.sentence: If one experience doesn’t work，don’t give up and you’ll surely find the right <highlight>opportunity</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果一次经历不起作用，请不要放弃，您一定会找到合适的机会。

examination_example.sentence: It is also a perfect <highlight>opportunity</highlight> (机会) to encourage others to take their first step toward becoming a volunteer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这也是鼓励他人迈出成为志愿者的第一步的绝佳机会。
